item.title: Signaling for Call Centers
item.description:
Every phone call involves two parts: the conversation itself and the signaling that manages the phone network. While signaling might seem purely technical, its implementation significantly impacts call center efficiency. Traditional analog phone lines use the same copper wires, called the local loop, for both voice and signaling. item.title: Fonality Call Center in a Box
item.description:
Thinking about starting a call center but worried about the initial expenses and complex setup? While a large-scale call center requires significant investment, there are solutions for businesses looking to add call center capabilities or start small and gradually expand. Fonality offers a “call center in a box” solution, providing a simplified yet robust system.
